thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Tower Bridge Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very Good Stay
thread.title_full: Very Good Stay - Review of Premier Inn London Tower Bridge Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: phoenix399
title: Very Good Stay
text: Service was awesome. Issues with cleaning staff leaving 1 towel for 2 people, but front staff straightened that out. The free WiFi service is not good. Though the upgrade of $5 for 24 hours was not reasonable for a 5 day stay. The Premium WiFi should be the free WiFi. Overall, the rooms are clean and beds are very comfortable.
